LOGIK

MODULE LOGIK-SYNTAX

SYNTAX Literal ::= Id
| Id ( Literals ) [ prec(0) ]
| [ Literals ]
| [ Literals | Literal ]

SYNTAX Literals ::= List{#Literal,","} [ prec(60) ]

SYNTAX Clause ::= Literal :- Literals . [ prec(70) ]
| Literal . [ prec(80) ]

SYNTAX Query ::= ?- Literals . [ prec(70) ]

SYNTAX Pgm ::= Query
| Clause Pgm [ prec(90) ]

END MODULE

MODULE LOGIK-SEMANTICS

CONFIGURATION :

  ·

$PGM
nextVar

0
solution

  ·  

SYNTAX Id ::= UnificationVar

RULE
'isUnificationVar (K )
true
when asciiString ( substrString ( Id2String ( K ) , 0 , 1 ) ) <Int 96 [ anywhere, structural ]

RULE
Lit .
Lit :-   ·   .
[ anywhere, structural ]

RULE
X :- Lits .
X (   ·   ) :- Lits .
[ anywhere, structural ]

RULE
[   ·   | L ]
L
[ anywhere, structural ]

RULE
[ L , Lits ]
[ L ,   ·   | [ Lits ] ]
[ anywhere, structural ]

RULE
[ L1 , L2 , Lits | L' ]
[ L1 ,   ·   | [ L2 ,   ·   | [ Lits | L' ] ] ]
[ anywhere, structural ]

RULE
X , Lits
X (   ·   ) , Lits
when 'isUnificationVar (X )=/=K true [ anywhere ]

RULE

unify ( Lit , Lit' ) ↝ Lits @ Lits'

SYNTAX K ::= alpha ( K )
| applyα ( K )

RULE
alpha ( K )
getα ( K ) ↝ applyα ( K )

RULE
subst (Eqns )↝ applyα ( K )
applySubst ( subst (Eqns ), K )

SYNTAX K ::= K @ K [ function, prec(70) ]

RULE

k

SYNTAX K ::= print ( K )
| printStr ( String )
| printEqn ( K )
| printLit ( K )
| printLits ( K )
| printList ( K )

RULE
print ( subst (K , Eqns ))
printEqn ( K ) ↝ print ( subst (Eqns ))

RULE
print ( subst (   ·   ))
  ·  

RULE
printEqn ( eqn (X , Lit ))
printStr ( Id2String ( X ) ) ↝ printStr ( " |-> " ) ↝ printLit ( Lit ) ↝ printStr ( "; " )

RULE
printLit ( X )
printStr ( Id2String ( X ) )

RULE
printLit ( X (   ·   ) )
printStr ( Id2String ( X ) )

RULE
printLit ( X ( Lit , Lits ) )
printStr ( Id2String ( X ) ) ↝ printStr ( "(" ) ↝ printLits ( Lit , Lits ) ↝ printStr ( ")" )

RULE
printLits ( Lit , Lit' , Lits )
printLit ( Lit ) ↝ printStr ( ", " ) ↝ printLits ( Lit' , Lits )

RULE
printLits ( Lit ,   ·   )
printLit ( Lit )

RULE
k

printStr ( Str )
  ·  
solution

  ·  
Str

RULE
printLit ( [   ·   ] )
printStr ( "[]" )

RULE
printLit ( [ Lit ,   ·   | Lit' ] )
printStr ( "[" ) ↝ printList ( [ Lit ,   ·   | Lit' ] ) ↝ printStr ( "]" )

RULE
printList ( [ Lit ,   ·   | [   ·   ] ] )
printLit ( Lit )

RULE
printList ( [ Lit1 ,   ·   | [ Lit2 ,   ·   | Lit' ] ] )
printLit ( Lit1 ) ↝ printStr ( ", " ) ↝ printList ( [ Lit2 ,   ·   | Lit' ] )

RULE
printList ( [ Lit ,   ·   | Lit' ] )
printLit ( Lit ) ↝ printStr ( " | " ) ↝ printLit ( Lit' )
when Lit' =/=K [   ·   ]

RULE
Id2String ( freshVar ( N ) )
"_" +String Int2String ( N )
[ structural, anywhere ]

END MODULE
